entry.title: thegreedymaster1234/JavaScript-Email-Protection-JEP: JavaScript Email Protection (JEP) is a simple and lightweight way to keep your email safe from spam bots. Instead of leaving your email exposed in plain HTML (where bots can easily grab it), this script dynamically inserts it using JavaScript—making it way harder for scrapers to detect.
entry.content: JavaScript Email Protection (JEP) is a simple and lightweight way to keep your email safe from spam bots. Instead of leaving your email exposed in plain HTML (where bots can easily grab it), this script dynamically inserts it using JavaScript—making it way harder for scrapers to detect.

entry.title: karimz1/imgcompress: a lightweight, Dockerized tool for quick, bulk image optimization—resizing and converting formats (including iPhone HEIC) into high-quality JPEG or PNG. Use it through a modern Web UI for an easy, fast workflow or leverage its CLI for seamless CI/CD integration.

entry.title: 0xGval/twitter-X-mcp-server: X Tools for Claude MCP: A lightweight toolkit enabling Claude AI to search Twitter with natural language and display unanalyzed results. Supports advanced Twitter search operators and filters by users, dates, and engagement metrics. Seamlessly integrates with Claude Desktop via MCP.
entry.content: X Tools for Claude MCP: A lightweight toolkit enabling Claude AI to search Twitter with natural language and display unanalyzed results. Supports advanced Twitter search operators and filters by users, dates, and engagement metrics. Seamlessly integrates with Claude Desktop via MCP.
